unit: Unit 7 | Inference for Quantitative Data: Means
title: Confidence Level and $2$-sided Significance Testing
question_text: A one sample $t$ -test for was used to conduct a test of the null hypotheses: $${ H }_{ 0 }:\mu =23.7$$ $${ H }_{ a }:\mu \neq 23.7$$ The $p$ -value was $0.034$ . A confidence interval for * $\mu$ * is to be constructed. Of the following, which is the largest level of confidence for which the confidence interval will NOT contain $23.7$ ?
